api_list.api_description: Send an email containing a link to manage your alerts.

required_parameters.name: email
required_parameters.description: A valid email address with existing alerts.

api_list.api_description: Retrieve exact card details based on card name.

required_parameters.name: exact
required_parameters.description: The exact card name to search for.

optional_parameters.name: set
optional_parameters.description: A set code to limit the search to one set.

query: How can I manage my current game price alerts via email through CheapShark? Also, could you retrieve the details of the Magic card 'Black Lotus' using Scryfall?
